faq.question: Are non-alcoholic beers completely alcohol-free?
faq.answer: Most non-alcoholic beers contain a very small amount of alcohol (typically less than 0.5% ABV), which is similar to the amount found in kombucha or ripe fruit. This amount is so small that it has no intoxicating effect.

faq.question: Do non-alcoholic beers taste like regular beer?
faq.answer: Modern non-alcoholic beers have come a long way in taste. Many craft options now taste very similar to their alcoholic counterparts, though there are still subtle differences in body and finish.
